price: په خړو خوارو سترګو به له قبرونو راوزي، لكه هغوى چې خواره واره ملخان وي.
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
